statements: SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_type = 'login';
SELECT activity_time, query_executed FROM suspicious_activities WHERE user_id = 456 ORDER BY activity_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_type IN ('logout', 'suspicious');
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_time FROM suspicious_activities WHERE user_id = 789 ORDER BY activity_time ASC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_time, query_executed FROM suspicious_activities WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY activity_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Login' AND activity_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT activity_type, COUNT(*) AS num_activities FROM suspicious_activities GROUP BY activity_type HAVING num_activities > 5 ORDER BY num_activities DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, activity_type FROM suspicious_activities WHERE user_id IN (456, 789) ORDER BY user_id, activity_type ASC;
SELECT user_id, MIN(activity_time) AS first_activity, MAX(activity_time) AS last_activity FROM suspicious_activities GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM audited_log WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT query, timestamp FROM audited_log WHERE query LIKE '%error%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_queries FROM audited_log;
SELECT user_id, query FROM suspicious_queries WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM audited_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM audited_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM audited_log WHERE user_id = 123 AND query LIKE '%SELECT%'
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM suspicious_queries
SELECT query, timestamp FROM audited_log WHERE user_id = 456 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, MIN(timestamp) AS first_query_timestamp FROM audited_log GROUP BY user_id
SELECT * FROM unauthorized_changes;
SELECT id, query, timestamp FROM unauthorized_changes ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT query, timestamp FROM unauthorized_changes WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Unauthorized Access';
SELECT id, description, timestamp FROM suspicious_activities ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM unauthorized_changes ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT query, timestamp FROM unauthorized_changes WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Suspicious' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT description FROM suspicious_activities WHERE id = 50
SELECT query_text, user FROM sql_queries WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM table1;
SELECT id, query, query_timestamp FROM table1 ORDER BY query_timestamp DESC;
SELECT table_name, change_type FROM table3 WHERE change_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, action FROM table2 WHERE action = 'login';
SELECT * FROM table4 WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY action_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM table1 ORDER BY query_timestamp DESC;
SELECT query_timestamp, query FROM table1 WHERE id = 5;
SELECT user_id, action, action_timestamp FROM table2 WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY action_timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, table_name FROM table3 WHERE change_type = 'update' AND table_name = 'products' ORDER BY change_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM table4 GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_actions > 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT action, timestamp FROM activity_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT log_id, table_name, timestamp FROM changes_log WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 100 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT u.username, a.action, al.access_level FROM users u JOIN activity_log a ON u.user_id = a.user_id JOIN authorization_log al ON u.user_id = al.user_id WHERE al.access_level = 'admin';
SELECT u.username, c.table_name, c.change_type, c.timestamp FROM users u JOIN changes_log c ON u.user_id = c.log_id WHERE u.username LIKE '%smith%';
SELECT u.username, s.description, s.timestamp FROM users u LEFT JOIN suspicious_activities s ON u.user_id = s.user_id WHERE s.activity_id IS NULL;
